topics.body:
Holy shit does windows on computers suck for updating.  I haven't updated by virtual machine operating system in a while and it's taking 2 hours to update.

Why is windows getting progressively more shitty?  All the versions of windows after xp, except windows 7, just seem to be getting progressively worse.  People used to joke about vista being bad, but then windows 8 came along.

postposting

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554e94d7636872124c7e0a00#post_554e94d7636872124c7e0a00
[bq="uc9"]*realizes I haven't updated windows on my computer in a while since I always use linux*
And now I remembered why I never use windows on my computer.  God updates take fucking forever on windows.  Legitimately for you windows users how do you deal with this shit?[/bq]
Windows updates don't take forever for me, and when they do take a while I just do something else while I wait, it's not that hard
